Name: market for cleft timber, measured as dry mass | cleft timber, measured as dry mass | EN15804GD, U
Category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/02:Forestry and logging/022:Logging/0220:Logging
Description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/12737/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This dataset represents the European market for cleft timber. It is considered that the uses of cleft timber occur in the vicinity of the forest, thus the necessity of regional markets. Transport distances are based on expert judgment.

Activity starts with the product leaving the factory gate, ready for shipment.

Activity ends with the reception of the product at the consuming entity. Average transportation requirements from producer to consuming entity are covered.
